task.title: Configuring AMF events
task.shortdesc: Use the amfEventProfile command to create the event state profile and the amfUePlmnServices command to update the event state profile name on PLMN services.

stepxmp.codeph: cmm amfEventProfile create --name eventProfile1 --connectivityStatus true --registrationState true --communicationFailure true --lossOfConnectivity true

step.cmd: Update the event state profile name on the PLMN services.
